entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 9:41AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .Recent heavy rainfall over the Saint Johns basin has slowed the decline in levels at Astor, leading to a slight rise over the last 18 hours. entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued October 13 at 3:11PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THREAT OF RIVER FLOODING MONDAY INTO TUESDAY FOR THE SKOKOMISH RIVER IN MASON COUNTY... A strong front will push across Western Washington Monday into Tuesday and will bring heavy rain over the Olympic Peninsula. Storm total rain around 2 to 4 inches can be expected. This rain will lead to rises on many rivers, and will likely bring the Skokomish River
